name: Sethsuwa Paspanguwa
short_description: Natural Herbal Drink Remedy For Cough
description: Herbal Sethsuwa paspanguwa. Authentic quality herbs and quick & easy preparation. The paspanguwa formulation typically consists of five ingredients: Ginger (Zingiber officinale), Pathpadagam (Hedyotis corymbosa), Katuwalbatu (Solanum xanthocarpum), Veniwalgata (Coscinium fenestratum) and Coriander (Coriandrum sativum). In some instances other herbs such as ‘Thippili’ (Piper longum), Thai eggplant (Solanum melongena), Black pepper (Piper nigrum), Wishnukranthiya (Evolvulus alsinoides) and Pawatta (Justicia adhatoda) may also be used. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
